org.ica.uiElements

Class AddNewGlobalEquation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Dialog
      • org.ica.uiElements.AddNewGlobalEquation

  • public class AddNewGlobalEquation
extends org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Dialog
    Class responsible for creating the controls to add an equation to the current project, or to modify an already added Equation. This Equation object has a global visibility.
    Author:
    Salim AHMED

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AddNewGlobalEquation(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell parent, java.util.List<java.lang.String> suggestions)
      This constructor is for adding a new Equation with a global scope to the project
      AddNewGlobalEquation(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell parent, java.util.List<java.lang.String> suggestions, Equation equation, boolean modification)
      This constructor serves to modify an equation statement.
